channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump threatens to use the Insurrection Act to stop anti-ICE protests in Minneapolis
item.description: President Trump has threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act in Minneapolis to quell ongoing protests against ICE, but local leaders say it's the White House that's escalating the situation.
item.content:encoded: President Trump has threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act in Minneapolis to quell ongoing protests against ICE, but local leaders say it's the White House that's escalating the situation.
item.dc:creator: Meg Anderson

item.title: Trump threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act in Minneapolis. What that would mean
item.description: What would it mean for President Trump to invoke the Insurrection Act to quell protests in Minneapolis? NPR's A Martinez asks Liza Goitein of the Brennan Center for Justice.
item.content:encoded: What would it mean for President Trump to invoke the Insurrection Act to quell protests in Minneapolis? NPR's A Martinez asks Liza Goitein of the Brennan Center for Justice.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Elon Musk's X to block AI chatbot Grok from making explicit images of real people
item.description: Elon Musk's social media company X says it will block its AI chatbot Grok from creating explicit images of real people after governments around the world launched investigations into the feature.
item.content:encoded: Elon Musk's social media company X says it will block its AI chatbot Grok from creating explicit images of real people after governments around the world launched investigations into the feature.
item.dc:creator: Huo Jingnan

item.title: Jodie Foster plans more French roles after 'A Private Life'
item.description: Jodie Foster has spoken French since she was a child. But it's only now that she's taken on a lead role scripted almost entirely in the language of Molière, for A Private Life.
item.content:encoded:
Jodie Foster has spoken French since she was a child. But it's only now that she's taken on a lead role scripted almost entirely in the language of Molière, for A Private Life.

(Image credit: Jérôme Prébois)
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: FEMA is getting rid of thousands of workers in areas recovering from disasters
item.description: Thousands of employees whose contracts end this year will lose their jobs, FEMA managers said at personnel meetings this week. The cuts could hobble the nation's disaster agency.
item.content:encoded:
Thousands of employees whose contracts end this year will lose their jobs, FEMA managers said at personnel meetings this week. The cuts could hobble the nation's disaster agency.

(Image credit: Jae C. Hong)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Hersher

item.title: 'A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms' is 'Game of Thrones' for the haters
item.description: There are no dragons, no maps and no internecine family trees in this Game of Thrones prequel about an underdog knight and his would-be squire.
item.content:encoded:
There are no dragons, no maps and no internecine family trees in this Game of Thrones prequel about an underdog knight and his would-be squire.

(Image credit: Steffan Hill)
item.dc:creator: Glen Weldon

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump threatens military action to stop the protests in Minneapolis, Maria Corina Machado presents Trump with her Nobel Peace Prize, Trump announces health plan that's scant on details.
item.content:encoded: Trump threatens military action to stop the protests in Minneapolis, Maria Corina Machado presents Trump with her Nobel Peace Prize, Trump announces health plan that's scant on details.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: The challenges prosecutors face in their case against Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro
item.description: Prosecutors face multiple challenges in proving Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro played a central role in a cocaine-trafficking conspiracy that spans some two decades.
item.content:encoded: Prosecutors face multiple challenges in proving Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro played a central role in a cocaine-trafficking conspiracy that spans some two decades.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: Are we in an AI bubble? Economists share the clues to look for
item.description: Are we in an AI bubble? Economists share the warning signs they watch for before the bubble bursts.
item.content:encoded: Are we in an AI bubble? Economists share the warning signs they watch for before the bubble bursts.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Guo

item.title: Heritage Foundation says declining marriage rates pose a threat to society
item.description: The Heritage Foundation argues in a new report that declining marriage rates pose a threat to society. NPR discusses the findings with Jennifer Sciubba of the Population Reference Bureau.
item.content:encoded: The Heritage Foundation argues in a new report that declining marriage rates pose a threat to society. NPR discusses the findings with Jennifer Sciubba of the Population Reference Bureau.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez
